Everyone raves about Ben's Chili Bowl, but I just can't get excited about it. My boyfriend absolutely loves their half smoke, but I find it extremely unappealing. The restaurant itself is dirty and seems unsanitary to me. I'm ok with the occasional greasy spoon, but this pushes it over the edge. Obviously there are a lot of other people who disagree with me, because the line is always out the door. And at their stand in Nationals Park, you'd miss several innings standing in line.
